comments.body: what is the point of inheriting the test suite? the tests in SessionCatalogSuite seems to test SessionCatalog and not HiveCatalog. that is, i dont see any code that customizes this suite to run existing tests with a HiveSessionCatalog.
comments.diffHunk:
